summary: A vlog capturing a woman's game-day experience with her family at a UGA game, followed by post-game celebrations.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a close-up of a coffee machine dispensing coffee into a glass filled with ice cubes, set against a backdrop of a coffee pod holder with various pods. The scene transitions to a person's hand, adorned with a gold ring, browsing through a closet filled with an array of clothes, including a white shirt with red patterns, a black and white checkered shirt, and a white fluffy garment. The hand selects a black and white checkered shirt, which is then laid out on a white knitted blanket. The person examines the shirt's fabric and texture, followed by a close-up of a black garment, possibly a pair of jeans, with the hand smoothing out the fabric. The video then shifts to a clear plastic bag with a gold clasp, decorated with stickers that read "KA THE DAWGS" and "DAWGS," placed on the same white knitted blanket. The hand points to the stickers, highlighting their design and text. The video concludes with a focus on the hand's interaction with the bag and stickers, emphasizing the details and textures of the objects.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with the sound of ice clinking, followed by a female speaker stating, "Great way to start off game day with some iced coffee." Shortly after, there's the sound of a door closing. The speaker continues, expressing indecision about what to wear to the game, stating that she always knows but doesn't today, mentioning she wants to wear black, white, or red, and her black knee-highs, despite it being a little cold. She then concludes that she has figured out her outfit and proceeds to describe it: a gingham shirt, a black top shop skirt, a clear bag from Amazon with a ton of Katie Loves the Dogs stickers, a Katie Loves the Dogs button, and black knee-high boots from Target, expressing optimism about the outfit.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman with long blonde hair, wearing a black and white checkered blouse and a star necklace, is seen sitting in a room with an open closet behind her, filled with various clothes. She appears to be speaking and gesturing with her hands. The room has a cozy atmosphere, with a bed covered in a chunky knit blanket visible in the background. The woman then turns to her right and reaches for something on the bed, which seems to be a package containing several round stickers. She holds up the package, showing the stickers to the camera. The stickers are black with white text that reads "KA ♥ THE DAWGS," indicating a possible affiliation or support for a group or team named "The Dawgs." The woman continues to display the stickers, turning the package to show different angles, and then holds up one of the stickers closer to the camera for a clearer view. Throughout the video, the woman maintains a friendly and engaging demeanor, likely discussing the stickers and their significance.
events_list.audio_caption: A single female speaker starts by describing a tradition at UGA, making buttons that say "Katie loves the dogs". Her tone is casual and friendly. She mentions that people walk around on game day with "Katie loves the dogs" stickers to put on friends and family. Her tone remains light and cheerful.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman with long blonde hair is seen sitting in a room with an open closet behind her, filled with various clothes. She is wearing a black and white checkered blouse and a delicate necklace. The woman is holding a round compact mirror with the Greek letters "ΚΔ" and the word "the" visible on it. She appears to be applying makeup, as she is seen holding a red lipstick and applying it to her lips. The room has a cozy atmosphere, with a knitted blanket draped over a piece of furniture in the background. The woman's facial expressions and gestures suggest she is engaged in a makeup routine, possibly explaining or demonstrating the use of the products she is using.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a female speaker mentioning a button and questioning which side to put it on. She then describes her outfit, explaining that she wants to add more red. Following this, she announces that she's going to put on some NYX soft matte lip cream in the color Monte Carlo. The clip concludes with background music playing, though the genre, tone, and instruments are unclear.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man in a red polo shirt standing in front of an open closet filled with clothes. He is holding a circular badge with the text "KA THE DAWGS" and a red heart symbol, which he then places on his shirt. The man gives a thumbs-up gesture, indicating approval or satisfaction. The scene transitions to a woman with long blonde hair wearing a striped top, who is also seen wearing the same badge. She appears to be speaking and gesturing with her hands. Another woman, wearing a gray sweater, joins her, and both women are shown wearing the badge. The video takes place in a domestic setting, with a kitchen visible in the background, suggesting a casual and friendly atmosphere. The overall theme of the video seems to be promoting or showcasing the badge, with the individuals expressing their support or affiliation with the message on the badge.
events_list.audio_caption: A young female speaker excitedly tells an older male, presumably her father, that she needs to put a sticker on him and asks for permission. After the "OK" from the older male, there's the sound of a sticker being peeled. Then, the young female speaker exclaims, "Katie loves the dogs, baby!" followed by "Go dogs!" and a brief, playful interaction with someone else, possibly another female. A female voice then comments about a sticker showing up well. Another, assumingly the first female, responds in agreement, then is followed by "Yay! Go dogs! Sick 'em woof!" A snippet of upbeat rap music with an energetic and confident tone begins, featuring a male vocalist and heavy use of auto-tune. The female speaker mentions the song is called "For My Dog" and suggests listening to it. She then sings along, emphasizing the lyrics about dogs. The speaker mentioned her father who is included in a "mimosa toast."

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man in a red polo shirt holding a glass of orange juice, standing in a room with a mirror and a Christmas tree in the background. The scene transitions to two women, one in a black and white checkered shirt and the other in a gray sweater, both wearing buttons that read 'Kappa Alpha Theta' and 'I love the Thangs.' They appear to be engaged in a conversation, with the woman in the checkered shirt gesturing with her hand. The focus then shifts to a close-up of the woman in the checkered shirt, who is wearing large white earrings and a necklace, speaking directly to the camera. The background shows an open door leading to a closet with clothes hanging inside. The video continues with the same woman, still in the checkered shirt, speaking and gesturing with her hands, with the open closet door and a bed with yellow pillows visible in the background. The atmosphere is casual and conversational, with the woman appearing animated and expressive throughout the video.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with music, a pop song with an upbeat and positive mood. The song seems to have a male vocalist and electronic instrumentals. A woman speaks in a casual tone, excitedly exclaiming "Go dog!". The pop song continues, then the woman speaks again. She recounts a story about putting on earrings, and her father asking if they were bulldog earrings. She speaks casually, saying she replied "No". The woman then states she will give a quick summary, as she doesn't think she started off the vlog well.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman with long blonde hair is seen speaking directly to the camera, wearing a black and white checkered shirt and a badge that reads "Kappa" with a heart symbol. She accessorizes with large white tassel earrings and a delicate necklace with a star pendant. The setting is a cozy bedroom with a bed, a yellow pillow, and a framed sign on the wall that says "MAKE TODAY A GOOD DAY." The woman gestures expressively with her hands, emphasizing her points as she talks. The room is well-lit, and the atmosphere is casual and inviting. The camera remains focused on her upper body and face, capturing her animated expressions and movements.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with upbeat, light pop music playing in the background. A young female speaker begins to describe her plans for the day, which involves giving her parents "the full UGA experience" for their own "parents weekend" because she missed the official event. She mentions that it is UGA's "last home football game", expresses hope that they "are hopefully going to win" against Kentucky. She recounts their one loss of the season, noting that she was at the game and "in the student section". The speaker sounds enthusiastic and cheerful.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with long blonde hair, wearing a black and white checkered blouse and white tassel earrings, engaging in various activities. Initially, she is seen indoors, gesturing with her hand, and later taking a selfie in front of a mirror, showcasing her outfit and a Christmas tree in the background. She then transitions to an outdoor setting, wearing a white sweatshirt and sunglasses, walking on a sidewalk with a man in a black jacket and beige pants. The scene shifts to her in a checkered blouse, taking a selfie with another woman in a gray sweater, standing on a porch with a brick building and windows in the background. The video then captures a bustling outdoor event with people in red shirts, including a man in a red shirt and cap interacting with a woman in a gray sweater. The woman is later seen in a red shirt, conversing with a man in a denim jacket and blue jeans, and taking a selfie with him against a brick wall. The video concludes with her holding a brown paper bag and a white smartphone, with a white takeout container and two small cups beside her, indicating a casual, everyday setting.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with excited female speech saying, "Section was really impressive, it's okay. We're going to come back today." She transitions to describing her outfit with a bright and upbeat tone. The female voice continues discussing their experience finding lunch, noting it is "literally packed, we have not been able to find a place to eat lunch absolutely anywhere, so this is great," with slightly sarcastic undertones. The soundscape shifts to music playing in the background, reminiscent of hip-hop and dance, but fading into background noise. The female speaker mentions their conclusion to go to a food truck, then describes getting food from "barburrito", detailing what everyone ordered with a cheerful tone, mentioning a unique game day experience. The audio concludes with the female voice indicating it's time for game day pictures, as they're "very vital to the game day experience."

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a vibrant scene at a stadium, where a large crowd, predominantly dressed in red, is seen entering through Gate 2. The atmosphere is lively, with people of various ages, including children, walking up the steps and mingling. The stadium's architecture, featuring a brick wall and metal framework, is visible in the background, along with an American flag flying high. As the crowd moves through the entrance, the excitement builds, with some individuals wearing red hats and jackets, and others sporting team logos and numbers on their shirts. The scene transitions to a close-up of two women, one in a gray sweater and the other in a blue and white striped shirt, both smiling and enjoying the event. The camera then pans out to reveal the stadium filled with spectators, all dressed in red, creating a sea of color. The focus shifts to a marching band in red uniforms, playing instruments and leading the crowd in a spirited display. The video concludes with a wide shot of the stadium, showcasing the enthusiastic crowd and the band's performance, encapsulating the energy and unity of the event.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a burst of energetic speech, someone chanting "Everybody go!" Then, a male speaker is briefly heard mentioning they're looking forward to something. A female speaker expresses gratitude for getting good seats, thanking someone and mentioning that someone picked the seats. She states her preference to sit with certain people. A brief cheering sound is mixed with speech, with "Kentucky" mentioned.  The audio concludes with upbeat marching band music, followed by another energetic cheer or shout.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a lively scene at a sports stadium filled with enthusiastic fans, predominantly dressed in red, indicating their support for a particular team. A woman in the foreground, wearing sunglasses and a gray sweater, is seen holding a red pom-pom, actively participating in the pregame festivities. She interacts with the crowd, waving the pom-pom and engaging with fellow fans, who are also dressed in red and holding similar pom-poms. The atmosphere is vibrant and energetic, with the crowd's excitement palpable as they prepare for the game. The text "PREGAME TRADITIONS" appears on the screen, emphasizing the communal and celebratory nature of the event. The video showcases the unity and spirit of the fans as they come together to support their team before the game begins.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a female speaker discussing a "life hack" her mom shared about achieving "poofy pom poms." She describes methods such as wrinkling and using rubber bands. Simultaneously, there's energetic band music playing, evocative of a sporting event, with a trumpet leading the melody. Interspersed with the music and speech is the sound of a crowd cheering and chanting "Go Dawgs!".

events_list.video_caption: The video captures the vibrant atmosphere of a football stadium filled with enthusiastic fans, predominantly dressed in red, as they participate in pregame traditions. A marching band, dressed in red and black uniforms, performs on the field, led by a conductor standing on a platform. The crowd, including individuals in casual attire and some wearing red shirts, cheers and waves flags, creating a lively and energetic environment. Cheerleaders in white and red uniforms perform on the sidelines, adding to the excitement. The stadium is packed with spectators, and the atmosphere is electric, with fans visibly engaged and enjoying the pregame festivities. The video showcases the unity and spirit of the fans as they come together to support their team, with the marching band and cheerleaders playing pivotal roles in setting the tone for the upcoming game.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with the sounds of a crowd cheering, featuring energetic chants of "Si, se puede", and the high-pitched tones of a whistle.  Music accompanies the cheering, contributing to the vibrant atmosphere. A male voice shouts "Hold up!" followed by a loud whistle. Then, a speech is heard, with additional cheering and whistles. The sound of an announcement is heard, punctuated by cheering. More music plays alongside additional crowd noise.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures the excitement of a football game at Sanford Stadium, with the scoreboard showing a tied score of 25-25. The scene opens with a player in a red uniform making a significant play, followed by a replay on the scoreboard. The crowd, dressed in red and white, is visibly engaged, with some fans holding up their phones to capture the moment. The text '4TH QUARTER TRADITION' appears, highlighting the significance of the game's final quarter. The atmosphere is electric, with fans cheering and celebrating, their faces filled with joy and anticipation. The video concludes with a close-up of two women, one in a striped shirt and the other in a gray sweater, both smiling and enjoying the game, encapsulating the shared excitement of the crowd.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male voice speaking loudly, expressing a desire to hold a microphone. This is followed by a marching band playing lively music, creating a festive atmosphere, possibly at a sporting event. A transition occurs with another person speaking, mentioning that it's the second half. A male voice shouts with enthusiasm and an element of excitement, and the marching band music resumes. A female voice speaks, exclaiming about touchdowns and acknowledging a person named Kylee watching her videos. The overall atmosphere is spirited, indicative of a celebratory occasion likely related to a sporting event.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with two women standing close together, one waving at the camera, both smiling and dressed in casual attire. The scene transitions to a woman in a gray turtleneck sweater, gesturing with her hands while speaking, in a room with a mirror and a Christmas tree in the background. The atmosphere shifts to a lively concert setting, where a large crowd is seen dancing and enjoying the music under colorful stage lights. A large screen displays various visuals, including a person in a white outfit and a group of people cheering. The DJ booth is visible, with the text 'DJRX' on a sign, indicating the DJ's name or brand. The video captures the energetic ambiance of the concert, with people dancing, taking photos, and engaging with the performance. The final frames show a close-up of a woman in a red top, dancing and smiling, surrounded by other concert-goers, highlighting the festive and joyful mood of the event.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a female speaker's brief exclamation "fuck", followed by another female uttering a thankful "Thank you". The scene shifts as a male speaker declares "dogs take the win". The setting transitions as a female speaker, in a conversational tone, shares "my friend and I have this tradition that, if we win, we go and dance to DJ RX because he goes every Saturday night after the game, and it's amazing, so got to do it," followed by, "Here's my outfit of the night, it's literally just so I can dance". Music takes over, a high-energy hip-hop beat, featuring a sample of a song with auto-tuned vocals, and including the rhythmic chanting of “Oh Oh Oh” interplaying throughout. The clip also captures ambient party sounds, suggesting a club scene.
